body:
All the schedule was posted today for the 2016 playoffs I'll post the link when I wake up. But just wanted to get the NHL fans that use these forums opinions on who's gunna win this year. I'm betting on Hawks or Caps. But hope the Wings and Cats can do good for the old folk on the teams.

I'll keep this post updated throughout the playoffs with the game results!

Match ups-

Series standings-
★= amount of games played.
> =  played in east
< = played in west

Click the hyperlinks to view the game highlights!

Round #1-

Detroit Redwings vs. Tampa Bay Lightning > ★★★★★4-1 Lightning win series.
Gm1: 3-2 Lightning win. ★ April 13th
Gm2: 5-2 Lightning win. ★ April 15th
Gm3: 2-0 Red Wings win. ★April 17th
Gm4: 3-2 Lightning win. ★April 19th
Gm5: 1-0 Lightning win. ★ April 21st

Pittsburgh Penguins vs. New York Rangers > ★★★★★ 4-1 Penguins win series.
Gm1: 5-2 Penguins win. ★ April 13th
Gm2: 4-2 Rangers win.★April 16th
Gm3: 3-1 Penguins win. ★ April 19th
Gm4: 5-0 Penguins win. ★April 21st
Gm5: 6-3 Penguins win. ★ April 22nd

Chicago Blackhawks vs. St. Louis Blues < ★★★★★★★ 4-3 Blues win series.
Gm1: 1-0 OT, Blues win.★ April 13th
Gm2: 3-2 Blackhawks win. ★ April 15th
Gm3: 3-2 Blues win. ★ April 17th
Gm4: 4-3 Blues win. ★ April 19th
Gm5: 4-3 2OT, Blackhawks win. ★April 21st
Gm6: 6-3 Blackhawks win. ★ April 23rd
Gm7: 3-2 Blues win. ★ April 25th

Washington Capitals vs. Philadelphia Flyers > ★★★★★★4-2 Capitals win series.
Gm1: 2-0 Capitals win. ★ April 14th
Gm2: 4-1 Capitals win. ★ April 16th
Gm3: 6-1 Capitals win. ★April 18th
Gm4: 2-1 Flyers win. ★April 20th
Gm5: 2-0 Flyers win. ★ April 22nd
Gm6: 1-0 Capitals win. ★ April 24th

Florida Panthers vs. New York Islanders > ★★★★★★ 4-2 Islanders win series.
Gm1: 5-4 Islanders win. ★ April 14th
Gm2: 3-1 Panthers win. ★ April 15th
Gm3: 4-3 OT, Islanders win. ★ April 17th
Gm4: 2-1 Panthers win. ★April 20th
Gm5: 2-1 2OT, Islanders win. ★April 22nd
Gm6: 2-1 2OT, Islanders win. ★ April 24th

Dallas Stars vs. Minnesota Wild < ★★★★★★ 4-2 Stars win series.
Gm1: 4-0 Stars win. ★ April 14th
Gm2: 2-1 Stars win. ★April 16th
Gm3: 5-3 Wild win. ★April 18th
Gm4: 3-2 Stars win. ★April 20th
Gm5: 5-4 OT, Wild win. ★ April 22nd
Gm6: 5-4 Stars win. ★ April 24th

San Jose Sharks vs. Los Angeles Kings < ★★★★★4-1 Sharks win series.
Gm1: 4-3 Sharks win. ★ April 14th 
Gm2: 2-1 Sharks win. ★April 16th
Gm3: 2-1 OT, Kings win. ★April 18th
Gm4: 3-2 Sharks win. ★April 20th
Gm5: 6-3 Sharks win. ★ April 22nd

Anaheim Ducks vs. Nashville Predators < ★★★★★★★4-3 Predators win series.
Gm1: 3-2 Predators win. ★ April 15th
Gm2: 3-2 Predators win. ★April 17th
Gm3: 3-0 Ducks win.★ April 19th
Gm4: 4-1 Ducks win. ★ April 21st
Gm5: 5-2 Ducks win. ★ April 23rd
Gm6: 3-1 Predators win. ★ April 25th
Gm7: 2-1 Predators win. ★ April 27th

Round #2-

Tampa Bay Lightning vs. New York Islanders > ★2-1 Lightning lead.
Gm1: 5-3 Islanders win.★ April 27th
Gm2: 4-1 Lightning win. ★April 30th
Gm3: 5-4 OT, Lightning win. ★ 
Gm4:

Pittsburgh Penguins vs. Washington Capitals > ★ 1-1 Tied.
Gm1: 4-3 OT, Capitals win. ★ April 28th
Gm2: 2-1 Penguins win. ★ April 30th

San Jose Sharks vs. Nashville Predators < ★ 1-0 Sharks lead series.
Gm1: 5-2 Sharks win. ★ April 29th


Dallas Stars vs. St. Louis Blues < ★ 2-2 Stars Tied.
Gm1: 2-1 Stars win.
Gm2: 4-3 OT, Blues win. ★ May 1st
Gm3: 6-1 Blues win. ★
Gm4: 3-2 OT, Stars win. ★

Post your predictions below!

replies.body:
It's a shame that no Canadian team made it to the playoffs. 

My predictions:

Stars vs Wild: I think Dallas beats Wild with 4-2 in matches. Dallas has been alot better than Minnesota this year.

Blues vs Blackhawks: Hawks win 4-2, Hawks has been a great team but Blues can change and take them. But i prefer Hawks

Ducks vs Predators: 4-3 to Predators. Predators has been great this year, but Ducks is a great team that should not be underestimated.

Kings vs Sharks: Kings is a liiittle better than Sharks. But Sharks home at the Shark Tank is hard. But kings win 4-2 in matches.

Panthers vs Islanders: Panthers is better than Islanders but Islanders could clinch a game or 2 but i believe that the Panthers have control of this, 4-1 to Panthers.

Bolts vs Red Wings: Bolts have had a better season than the Red Wings. I think the Bolts will take this series easy. 4-1.

Capitals vs Flyers: Capitals won the Presidents trophy, doesn't mean that they will beat the Flyers easy, Flyers is a good team. I think it will be pretty even 4-2 or 4-3 to Capitals.

Penguins vs Rangers: Penguins has been okay this season, so has Rangers. Neither teams has done their bestest, but since it is Stanley Cup it will be a great tempo. 4-3 to the Rangers.
replies.body_tagged:
It's a shame that no Canadian team made it to the playoffs. 

My predictions:

Stars vs Wild: I think Dallas beats Wild with 4-2 in matches. Dallas has been alot better than Minnesota this year.

Blues vs Blackhawks: Hawks win 4-2, Hawks has been a great team but Blues can change and take them. But i prefer Hawks

Ducks vs Predators: 4-3 to Predators. Predators has been great this year, but Ducks is a great team that should not be underestimated.

Kings vs Sharks: Kings is a liiittle better than Sharks. But Sharks home at the Shark Tank is hard. But kings win 4-2 in matches.

Panthers vs Islanders: Panthers is better than Islanders but Islanders could clinch a game or 2 but i believe that the Panthers have control of this, 4-1 to Panthers.

Bolts vs Red Wings: Bolts have had a better season than the Red Wings. I think the Bolts will take this series easy. 4-1.

Capitals vs Flyers: Capitals won the Presidents trophy, doesn't mean that they will beat the Flyers easy, Flyers is a good team. I think it will be pretty even 4-2 or 4-3 to Capitals.

Penguins vs Rangers: Penguins has been okay this season, so has Rangers. Neither teams has done their bestest, but since it is Stanley Cup it will be a great tempo. 4-3 to the Rangers.

replies.body: And now moving onto the footy
replies.body_tagged: And now moving onto the footy

replies.body:
The Lightning take a 2-0 lead in their series vs. The Red Wings as they win 5-2 in a penalty filled game. 58 penalty minutes for Tampa and 68 for Detroit most coming in the last minute of play. Tyler Johnson had 4 points in that game (2g, 2a).

Florida Panthers tie their series against the N.Y. Islanders. Roberto Luongo made 41 saves for his first playoff win in 5 years.

Blackhawks tie up their series by beating the Blues 3-2. The game winner was scored into an empty net.

Preds and Ducks tied 1-1 after the first.

I'll post the highlights in the OP tomorrow morning.
replies.body_tagged:
The Lightning take a 2-0 lead in their series vs. The Red Wings as they win 5-2 in a penalty filled game. 58 penalty minutes for Tampa and 68 for Detroit most coming in the last minute of play. Tyler Johnson had 4 points in that game (2g, 2a).

Florida Panthers tie their series against the N.Y. Islanders. Roberto Luongo made 41 saves for his first playoff win in 5 years.

Blackhawks tie up their series by beating the Blues 3-2. The game winner was scored into an empty net.

Preds and Ducks tied 1-1 after the first.

I'll post the highlights in the OP tomorrow morning.

replies.body:
Game #3 between the Red Wings and Lightning start in an hour from Detroit.

Blues beat the Hawks 3-2 to give them a 2-1 series lead this afternoon.
replies.body_tagged:
Game #3 between the Red Wings and Lightning start in an hour from Detroit.

Blues beat the Hawks 3-2 to give them a 2-1 series lead this afternoon.

replies.body:
Andrew Shaw of Blackhawks was suspended 1 game for homophobic slurs/gestures towards NHL officials. He was also fined 5k for his actions and needs to attend a seminar about it... Blackhawks are down 3-1 to the Blues and will face elimination tomorrow night in St. Louis. rip Hawks.

Tonight the Caps can advance to the second round by beating the Flyers and sweeping the series.

The Panthers and Islanders also play later tonight with the Isles leading the series 2-1.

Stars & Wild + Sharks & Kings are the late games tonight. The Stars and Sharks hold the leads in those series 2-1.
replies.body_tagged:

Tonight the Caps can advance to the second round by beating the Flyers and sweeping the series.

The Panthers and Islanders also play later tonight with the Isles leading the series 2-1.

Stars & Wild + Sharks & Kings are the late games tonight. The Stars and Sharks hold the leads in those series 2-1.

replies.body:
Most of the games on ATM are just finishing overtime or starting it. The Two finals so far are:
2-0 win for the Flyers over Caps.
2-1 win for the Islanders in double OT over the Panthers.

Stars and Wild are tied 4-4 end of regulation.
Kings and Sharks tied 3-3 end of the second period.
